item.description:
Anyone  want to attend the Nashua Theatre Guild initial play of the new season?

If so we can meet at Portland Pie Co 1st for dinner, then we will go as a group to the theater  at 14 Court St., next to the library; to see:

........ the first show of their 52nd season, Nashua Theatre Guild presents "Come Back to the 5 & Dime, Jimmy Dean, Jimmy Dean" by Ed Graczyk. The time is 1975 and the locale is a dusty Texas town nearby the site where Dean filmed his last movie.

The show starts at 8 pm cost is $15. Anyone who only wants to go to the show either be at Portland Pie at 7:30 or meet us at the theater at 7:45.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dinner & a Movie (actually a PLay)
